text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem nutritionintake-status-reason

Profile: Shareable CodeSystem

This case-sensitive code system http://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/nutritionintake-status-reason defines the following codes in a Is-A hierarchy:

CodeDisplayDefinition
1 Incomplete DataData needed to safely act on the intake which was expected to become available independent of the intake is not yet available.
2 Unable to provide careFulfiller not able to provide appropriate care associated with fulfilling the intake.
3 Request requires clarificationClarification is required before the intake can be acted upon.
4 AllergyThe patient/subject is believed to be allergic to a substance that is part of the therapy and the therapy is being temporarily withdrawn to confirm.
5 Suspected intoleranceThe patient/subject is believed to have an intolerance to a substance that is part of the therapy and the therapy is being temporarily withdrawn to confirm.
6 Entered in ErrorThe request was recorded against the wrong patient or for some reason should not have been recorded (e.g. wrong medication, wrong dose, etc.). Some of the actions that are implied by the medication request may have occurred. For example, the medication may have been dispensed and the patient may have taken some of the medication.
7 Patient/subject scheduled for surgeryPatient/subject is receiving surgery and/or the subject is scheduled to be admitted for surgery in the near future. The intake will be resumed when the subject has sufficiently recovered from the surgery.
8 Product not availableCannot supply product.

concept.definition: Data needed to safely act on the intake which was expected to become available independent of the intake is not yet available.
Fulfiller not able to provide appropriate care associated with fulfilling the intake.
Clarification is required before the intake can be acted upon.
The patient/subject is believed to be allergic to a substance that is part of the therapy and the therapy is being temporarily withdrawn to confirm.
The patient/subject is believed to have an intolerance to a substance that is part of the therapy and the therapy is being temporarily withdrawn to confirm.

The request was recorded against the wrong patient or for some reason should not have been recorded (e.g. wrong medication, wrong dose, etc.). Some of the actions that are implied by the medication request may have occurred. For example, the medication may have been dispensed and the patient may have taken some of the medication.

Patient/subject is receiving surgery and/or the subject is scheduled to be admitted for surgery in the near future. The intake will be resumed when the subject has sufficiently recovered from the surgery.
